transcend.4_1:
ATK DEF HP +16%
+3% Ally Team Resilience
+1 Chain Passive Weakness Gauge damage
transcend.6:
ATK DEF HP +30%
+3% Ally Team Resilience
+25 Action Points at battle start

SKT_FIRST.name: Moonlight Slash
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy, and if the caster has a Barrier, deals an Additional Attack.\nAfter attacking, there is a <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> chance to trigger a Dual Attack from the ally with the highest Attack. If an Additional Attack occurs, the Dual Attack chance increases by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>.

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Activates an additional attack\nActivates Dual Attack with 1 ally

description: Attacks an enemy, and if the caster has a Barrier, deals an Additional Attack.\nAfter attacking, there is a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000103_1_2]</color> chance to trigger a Dual Attack from the ally with the highest Attack. If an Additional Attack occurs, the Dual Attack chance increases by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>.

SKT_SECOND.name: Hero's Emergence
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: Removes <color=#28d9ed>1</color> debuff(s) from all allies and grants a Barrier for <color=#28d9ed>2</color> turns. Barrier Strength increases proportionally to the caster's max Health.
description: Removes <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000103_2_1]</color> debuff(s) from all allies and grants a Barrier for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000103_2_2]</color> turns. Barrier Strength increases proportionally to the caster's max Health.

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Someday I Will Reach the Moon
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. With a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance, grants <color=#28d9ed>Unbuffable</color> on all targets for <color=#28d9ed>3</color> turns.
description: Attacks all enemies. With a <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_C_2000103_3_1]</color> chance, grants <color=#28d9ed>Unbuffable</color> on all targets for <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_T_2000103_3_1]</color> turns.

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: Recovers <color=#28d9ed>25</color> Chain Points after attacking.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Grants a Barrier for 1 turn proportional to the caster's Max Health after attacking.
description: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: Recovers <color=#28d9ed>[Buff_V_2000103_chain_1_1]</color> Chain Points after attacking.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: Grants a Barrier for 1 turn proportional to the caster's Max Health after attacking.

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
